customer_info

Class PayingCustomer

  • java.lang.Object
    • customer_info.Customer
      • customer_info.PayingCustomer

  • public class PayingCustomer
extends Customer
    This class represents Paying Customer which stores the Payer object.

    Title : ICT373 Assignment 1, Question 2 - Personalised Magazine Service Author : Madyarini Grace Ariel Date : 12/6/2019 Filename : PayingCustomer.java Purpose : Contains the Paying Customer class implementation as well as setter and getter methods.
